scripts.docker: docker build -t jkpgcity . && docker tag jkpgcity localhost:5001/jkpgcity && docker push localhost:5001/jkpgcity
scripts.k8s-deploy: kubectl apply -f kubernetes/namespace.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/service.yaml && kubectl rollout restart -n jkpgcity deployment jkpgcity-deployment
